cn.description:
Luwian 是一款复杂的相机应用程序，旨在提供对相机硬件的完全手动控制，从而使用户能够使用 DSLR 设计释放他们的创造力。此外，该应用程序还附带 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 后处理编辑器，可提高图像质量。

Luwian 提供的手动控制包括曝光、对焦、对焦锁定、变焦和白平衡，以及预设和自定义调整选项、ISO 和快门速度。该应用程序还提供对 40 个滤镜、29 个虚拟 FX、17 个模拟电影和 36 个经典电影色调的访问，这些都可以在主相机面板上轻松使用。

Luwian 是业余和专业摄影师的强大工具，提供一系列功能，使他们能够轻松捕捉令人惊叹的图像。其直观的界面确保用户可以轻松导航应用程序并访问其功能，而其手动控件使他们能够对相机硬件进行精确控制。借助 Luwian，摄影师可以精确、清晰地捕捉他们的视觉，使其成为摄影领域人士的理想工具。

主要面板特点：

曝光控制
对焦+对焦锁定控制
飞涨
白平衡
国际标准化组织
快门速度
目标网格
全屏

真实深度背景相机（仅限 iPhone 11 及更高版本）
快门定时器
手动模式
自动模式

经典滤镜和视觉特效

导入/选择/删除

照片质量设置

打开和关闭主面板过滤器视图

cn.description:
当您需要一个功能完备的媒体播放器来管理、组织和播放各种类型的视频时，VidHub会满足您的需求！VidHub是一款广受欢迎的媒体播放器，不仅能够播放各种不同格式的视频，，同时，VidHub内置各种媒体库管理、网络共享等功能，提供快速、稳定的视频播放，带来非凡的用户体验。
VidHub的主要功能包括：
- 支持iOS、Mac、Apple TV平台，通过iCloud实现数据同步
- 广泛的视频格式支持 - VidHub能够播放各种格式的视频，包括.mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv等等。让您在一款播放器中体验多样的视频内容。
- 高品质视频播放 - VidHub支持高清、 4K、 HDR 等各种视频，呈现出流畅清晰的视频观感。
- 字幕支持 - VidHub支持视频内置字幕，并可以挂载多种外置字幕格式，例如SRT,SSA,SUB，并支持字幕调整功能。用户可以根据需要开启或关闭字幕，获得良好的观看体验。
- 网络共享媒体库 - VidHub支持访问多种网络共享协议，包括 SMB/CIFS，WebDav，也支持访问云端视频文件，例如Dropbox, Google Drive， OneDrive，百度网盘，阿里云盘, 移动云盘, 115 盘，天翼云盘。方便您轻松访问云端视频和其他WebDav服务器上的媒体库。
- 支持下载、删除云端文件
- 支持重命名云端文件，支持添加字符、替换字符、正则表达式重命名方式
- 支持直连Emby、Jellyfin、Plex媒体库 - 连上即可播放，无需再为追剧看片烦恼。
- 方便的文件管理 - VidHub有自己的媒体库管理器，并支持用美观简洁的界面展示视频的清单。用户可以按照类型、日期、分级、评分等分类，快速找到需要的媒体文件。

总的来说，VidHub是一款功能丰富的媒体播放器，能够管理、组织和播放各种媒体文件。VidHub会让您的视频播放更加愉悦，让您获得高质量的观看体验。

注意：影片资料和封面是由 TMDB 提供，TMDB 是一个由网络社区维护的电影和电视节目免费数据库。

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use

https://zh.okaapps.com/terms_vidhub

cn.description:
MagicKit AI – 全能设备与实用工具包

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的实用工具应用，旨在帮助您监控设备状态、优化性能，并从一个便捷界面访问日常工具。专为 iOS 打造，MagicKit AI 集合了多种核心功能，同时保护您的隐私并节省电池。

设备与系统工具：
• 电池状态：查看当前电量和充电状态
• 存储使用情况：分析可用与已用空间
• 设备信息：查看基本硬件与系统详情
• 运行时间监控：了解设备持续运行时间
• 电池使用建议：获取实用省电技巧
• 照片清理：检测并删除重复或相似照片以释放空间

网络工具：
• 网速测试：测量您的互联网连接速度
• Wi-Fi 信息：查看网络名称、IP 地址和连接状态
• IP 查询：查看公网 IP 的地理位置

实用工具：
• 单位换算器：支持多种单位互转
• 货币转换器：实时汇率与换算
• 日期时间计算器：支持工作日差值计算
• 时区转换器：全球时间转换，含夏令时支持
• 倒计时与提醒：创建美观倒计时，可自定义提醒与重复事件
• Magic 计数器：多项目统计追踪，含连续天数与数据统计
• 二维码扫描：快速识别二维码
• 文档扫描：高质量扫描保存文档
• 指南针与水平仪：使用设备传感器测量方向与水平
• 屏幕方向锁定：在应用内锁定屏幕方向
• 音频检测仪：通过麦克风测量环境音量
• 剪贴板管理器：访问并管理当前会话复制内容
• 手电筒：开启设备手电筒
• 亮度调节：直接在应用内调整屏幕亮度

功能亮点：
• 简洁易用的向导式界面
• 无广告，无内购
• 轻量节能
• 兼容所有 iOS 设备
• 工具持续更新添加
• 注重隐私与性能设计

适用人群：
• 设备状态监控与性能优化
• 日常换算与测量任务
• 文档与二维码扫描
• 照片清理释放空间
• 倒计时提醒管理
• 习惯追踪与进度统计
• 快速工具访问（如手电筒、亮度）
• 简易网络诊断

立即下载 MagicKit AI，用一个智能强大的工具包简化您的日常任务！

advisories: 偶尔/轻微的卡通或幻想暴力
cn.description:
===铁皮公司正版授权===
===中国地区正式回归===

这是游戏创作者继获奖作品Kingdom Rush（王国保卫战）三部曲之后的又一超凡太空奇幻历险之作。即时，动态以及深度策略的游戏模式将带你穿越到不可思议的未知星球。沉浸式拟真游戏场景，过瘾的游戏玩法，以及超凡绝佳的艺术感和一丝诙谐幽默感带你进入激烈的战争世界。勇猛的士兵，威猛的机甲人和强大的外星人通通等你来统率，并肩迎接最强挑战。

招募和训练银河系中最伟大的英雄，率领他们参与几乎不可能完成的危险任务，发动他们强大的力量和能力。即使是在战斗最激烈的时候你也可通过改变自己部队的角色而进行战略调整，突击队员调整为狙击兵，火焰喷射器调整为导弹发射器。通过炸弹袭击，智能地雷，支援部队，砲塔和各种特种武器转变战斗态势。

机器人军队整装待发;星际战舰坠毁了;到处是巨大怪物，未知的种族;所向披靡的攻击;绝望的营救;无所畏惧地破坏行动正在银河之中发生......银河系需要你的统领。

银河系需要钢铁战队

***游戏特色***

-指导你的部队参加3个不同世界的21次任务。准备好发动英勇的攻击，坚守阵地，拯救平民，潜入超级计算机和各种英雄的物品。每个任务需要新的战术和行动才能取得胜利。

-通过17次终结式特别行动的战术规则测试你的机智。每个关卡通过伤痕铭记挑战。谅你也不敢。

-解锁不可能模式。仅对大无畏敢死队开放。谅你绝对不敢。

-在史诗战斗中击败巨大而非凡的头目。这些头目卑鄙而异常地巨大，他们决心要将你碾碎。钢铁战队，整装待发！

-40+升级以提升你的战略，同时授予你的部队防御无人机，凝固汽油弹火箭，反弹爆炸和更多的器械可使用。

-14位具有出色能力的英雄听从你的调遣。将他们训练到极致出色，否则惹恼他们后果自负。

-8种可向敌人发动进攻的特种武器，让你的战术更加具有深度。还有什么比得上一个瞄准了的导弹？对50枚高爆炸炸弹的轨道炮袭击！

-完成70+成就中的任何成就，赢得你应得的奖励。

选择你的游戏困难模式，找到属于你的公平挑战：休闲，普通或老兵，你自己决定！！

advisories: 无限制网页访问
cn.releaseNotes:
- Introducing two Controls for watchOS: Bookmarks and Quick access. Open any webpage or the app with your Action Button or from the Control Center
- Ready for the new OS versions
- minor fixes
cn.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

hk.description:
Looking for a feature-packed and efficient media player to manage, organize, and play different types of video content? Enter VidHub! As the newest and most popular media player, VidHub serves up more than just the ability to play all types of video formats. With extensive media library management and network sharing functionalities, VidHub promises stable and speedy video playback for an exceptional user experience.

Some of the key features that VidHub offers include:
- Support iOS, Mac, Apple TV platform, data synchronization through iCloud
- Support for a comprehensive range of video formats, including .mkv、.avi、.mp4、.mov、.rmvb、.wmv, and more
- High-quality video playback for HD, 4K, HDR, and various other resolutions
- The ability to enable and disable subtitles, with support for embedded and external subtitle formats such as SRT, SSA, and SUB
- Network sharing capabilities, with support for SMB/CIFS, WebDav, and other protocols, as well as access to cloud-based video files from Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive, and Baidu Netdisk, Aliyun disk, 139 drive, 115 netdisk, enabling easy access to video files on remote servers and cloud storage services.
- Support downloading and deleting cloud files
- Support renaming cloud files, support add character, replace character, regular expression renaming method.
- Support direct-link to Emby, Jellyfin, Plex media server.
- Built-in media library management tools, with an intuitive interface for displaying videos and customizable sorting options by type, date, rating, and more.

All in all, VidHub offers a fully-featured and outstanding media player experience, delivering the smoothest and highest-quality viewing experience for all types of video content, with all the customizations and features one could desire.

Note: The metadata and artwork are sourced from TMDB, a movie and TV show database that is maintained by the community.

hk.releaseNotes: - 更新：更新商店頁面中的遊戲描述。
hk.description:
--

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選
● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎
● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

遊戲特色：
● 地城+解謎+倉庫番

hk.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

hk.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

hk.description:
重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：
聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com
在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames
訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

hk.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

hk.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

hk.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

hk.description:
MagicKit AI – 全方位裝置與工具箱

MagicKit AI 是一款完整的實用工具應用程式，專為 iOS 設計，幫助您監控裝置狀態、優化效能，並透過單一介面輕鬆使用日常工具。功能齊全，兼顧隱私與電池續航。

裝置與系統工具：

實用工具：

hk.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

hk.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

mo.description:
生命是寶貴的，你的時間也是如此。 ATracker幫助你記錄你的時間。

ATracker是一款時間記錄APP，非常易于使用，只需要很少的設定。它支援：一鍵啟動/停止時間記錄;條形圖或餅圖顯示您的時間去向;完全可定制的用戶界面;用標簽對任務進行分類;CSV和PDF資料匯出;在多個設備之間同步資料;通過Apple Watch，Widget和Siri開始/停止記錄。
這是一個全新的方式來組織你的一天。

范圍
ATracker是一種干凈簡約的追蹤方式：
 - 工作中的不同任務和專案
 - 學校研究和專案
 - 健身
 - 社交
 - 家庭作業
 - 嬰兒或兒童日常活動
 - 業余愛好專案
 - 或任何人們想要記錄和時間管理的活動

功能特色:
 - 只需輕按一下即可開始和停止記錄任務。
 - 今日的時間使用概覽。
 - 目標系統。
 - 完整的活動日志。專案歷史記錄。添加錯過或修改現有的時間記錄。
 - 自定義活動，有數百個圖標可供選擇。您還可以對任務設定顏色。
 - 柱狀圖和餅型圖報告。
 - 按標簽分組任務，并允許用戶按今日標簽上的標記過濾任務，以及在報告中顯示持續時間或次數。
 - 任務記時即使在設備關閉時仍然工作。
 - 任務定時. 鬧鈴即使在套用關閉狀態仍然會響
 - 手勢支援
 - 小部件
 -  Apple Watch支援
 -  Siri快捷方式
 - iPad支援Split View和Slide Over的多任務支援。
 - 使用PDF和CSV檔案匯出資料。
 - 能夠為每個任務條目記錄文本注釋。
 - 完全自定義具有更多外觀的UI，并允許用戶使用自己的圖片作為背景。

WEB訂閱
通過Web訂閱，ATracker支援跨多個設備進行同步。除App外，它還提供對ATracker服務的Web訪問。此附加組件是可選的。
在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。
 - 費用將在確認購買時向您的iTunes賬號收取
 - 您的訂閱會自動更新，除非您在已付費期間結束前至少24小時關閉自動更新
 -  您的賬號會在已付費期間結束前24小時內被再次收費
 -  您可以在購買后前往賬號設定管理訂閱并關閉自動更新
 -  您無法在已付費期間內取消購買
 - 如果您的試用還未結束，剩余的天數在您開始訂閱后會自動失效

APP支援
訪問https://support.wonderapps.se或通過support@wonderapps.se與我們聯系
服務條款：https://atracker.pro/atracker_TOS.html
隱私政策：https://atracker.pro/atracker_policy.html

獲獎：

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡
● 地城氛圍的像素美術

mo.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

mo.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

mo.description:
重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：
聯絡 HandyGamesTM: www.handy-games.com
在 Facebook 上關注我們：HandyGames
訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

mo.description:
Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

Luwian 提供的手動控制包括曝光、對焦、對焦鎖定、變焦和白平衡，以及預設和自訂調整選項、ISO 和快門速度。該應用程式還提供對 40 個濾鏡、29 個虛擬 FX、17 個模擬電影和 36 個經典電影色調的訪問，這些都可以在主相機面板上輕鬆使用。

Luwian 是業餘和專業攝影師的強大工具，提供一系列功能，使他們能夠輕鬆捕捉令人驚嘆的影像。其直覺的介面確保用戶可以輕鬆導航應用程式並存取其功能，而其手動控制使他們能夠對相機硬體進行精確控制。透過 Luwian，攝影師可以精確、清晰地捕捉他們的視覺，使其成為攝影領域人士的理想工具。

mo.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

mo.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

在套用內購買的 ATracker 服務會依照您的套餐每月或每年續訂。套餐價格可能會因國家/地區而異。

µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

獲獎：
● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選

● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡

tw.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

tw.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

重要
它不支持：iPhone 5S，iPad Air，iPad Mini 2＆3和iPod Touch

This Is the Police 2是廣受好評的黑色劇“This Is the Police”的續集，你可以在其中酌情解釋法律！運行警長的部門，管理你的員警，調查，審問和監禁。在這個由故事推動的冒險、戰略和回合制戰術戰鬥混合遊戲中，做出艱難的決定 - 並儘量避免自己入獄！

這是模擬？管理遊戲？戰術挑戰？視覺小說？謎題？全部都是，還不止！

深入獨一無二的故事推動體驗。
歡迎來到夏普伍德，一個寒冷而嚴酷的邊境小鎮，充滿了暴力，沒有人是完全無辜的。這個城鎮是走私者、幫派和尖叫的民粹主義者的老巢。為了維護和平與秩序，年輕的警長莉莉·裡德（莎拉·漢密爾頓）不得不與逃犯傑克·博伊德（喬恩·聖約翰）合作，並祈禱她的危險計畫不會失控。

掌管警長的部門。
你的下屬不僅僅是一些資源，他們是有各自長處、弱點、恐懼和偏見的活人 - 為了存活，你必須應對所有這些人。你的人喝得太多了嗎？或者總是有不上班的藉口？還是他拒絕遵守命令？如果想在這個部門維持紀律，你必須施展堅定的手腕。

參與戰術戰鬥。
在最危險的操作中，遊戲將切換到回合制戰鬥。召集你最好的員警團隊。仔細研究地形，調整計畫，悄悄接近嫌疑人並使用非致命武器和裝備 - 如果情況允許的話。沒錯，有時槍戰幾乎是不可避免的，但要小心：“This Is the Police 2”遊戲沒有生命值。一顆子彈就可能讓員警喪命。

成為一名真正的偵探。
收集證據，研究案件材料，審問嫌犯並將罪犯送上法庭。如果嫌疑人是無辜的？也許是時候看看是否可以收買夏普伍德的法官。

感謝您選擇 'THIS IS THE POLICE 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見：

訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：HandyGames
在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞：@handy_games
在 Instagram 上關注我們：handygames

© www.handy-games.com GmbH

Luwian 是一款複雜的相機應用程序，旨在提供對相機硬體的完全手動控制，從而使用戶能夠使用 DSLR 設計釋放他們的創造力。此外，該應用程式還附帶 Luwian Raw Magic Lite 後處理編輯器，可提高影像品質。

tw.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

tw.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

在現今快節奏的生活中，越來越多的人開始關注自己的健康和體重，同時也嘗試在有限的預算內實現這些目標。Roman 應用是一個全面的解決方案，專為那些希望實現減肥運動、減肥餐、減脂等目標的人設計。無論您是關心健康管理、身材管理、營養、瘦身計劃、卡路里追踪、身體變化、飲食習慣、熱量消耗、營養價值、健身目標、體重監測、飲食建議、營養平衡還是飲食健康，Roman 應用都能滿足您的需求。

以下是 Roman 應用的主要特點，將幫助您在預算內實現健康和減肥目標：
• 個性化膳食計劃: Roman 應用的核心功能之一是個性化的膳食計劃。無論您是想要減重、增肌還是保持健康，應用都能根據您的目標和偏好，提供一個度身定制的飲食計劃。您只需輸入您的當前體重，就能獲得一份詳細的膳食計劃，而不必擔心財政壓力。
• 經濟實惠的健康生活: Roman 應用還提供了有關營養、膳食準備和卡路里意識選擇的實用建議。您將學會如何在預算內享受到美味的食物，同時實現健康目標。我們明白，過多的開支可能會限制您的選擇，因此我們的飲食計劃設計得非常實惠。
• 進度追踪: 成功的減肥旅程需要持之以恆的努力和監控。Roman 應用內置了跟踪功能，可以幫助您密切關注您的進展。您可以輕鬆追踪自己的卡路里攝入和消耗，同時查看您實現理想體重的路程。這有助於您保持動力並負責到底。
• 設定和實現目標: 設定健康和減肥目標是成功的第一步。Roman 應用可以幫助您設定實際的目標，並跟踪您的進度。無論您是想要擁有更健康的生活方式還是減肥成功，這個應用都能夠幫助您實現您的目標。
• 經濟實惠的膳食計劃: 當談到減肥時，飲食是成功的關鍵之一。Roman 應用的經濟實惠的膳食計劃可以幫助您優化飲食，以確保在不花大錢的情況下實現目標。我們明白，預算限制可能會成為挑戰，因此我們的飲食計劃設計得非常實惠。
• 卡路里在預算內追踪: 卡路里攝入和支出對於減肥至關重要。Roman 應用提供了一個功能強大的卡路里追踪工具，可幫助您確保您的卡路里攝入在預算內。這是實現減肥和預算健康目標的重要步驟。

Roman (體重管理、減肥日記) 應用是實現更健康、經濟實惠生活方式的理想選擇。不再需要花大錢參加昂貴的減肥計劃，也不再需要擔心飲食選擇會給您的錢包帶來壓力。我們的應用提供了您實現健康和減肥目標所需的工具和指導。無論您的目標是減肥、改善健康還是簡單地更節儉地生活，Roman 應用都能幫助您實現這些目標。從今天開始，使用 Roman 應用，開啟您的經濟實惠減肥之旅！

tw.description:
全球最讓人欲罷不能的防禦遊戲歸來——歡迎來到《王國保衛戰：前線！》

空前盛大激烈的王國保衛戰：「前線」是全新的關卡，帶來迅猛刺激、扣人心弦的玩法，讓這款原創遊戲成為廣受歡迎的獲獎佳作。在這場史詩級的冒險（災難）中，可點擊你的部隊，配合最新的防禦塔、關卡、英雄和更多好東東，守衛異國大陸，抵禦飛龍、食人植物和地下世界恐怖族群的侵擾，把敵人統統殲滅。（別擔心，前作舊版的好東東，全都有保留。現在是經典復刻版。） 

《王國保衛戰：前線》內容豐富，像是全新升級的火炮讓你垂涎，像素畫面帶給你娛樂好享受！

遊戲特點 

· 鞏固異國大陸的前線——堅守沙漠、叢林還有地下世界的陣地 
· 8種特別防禦塔升級！用弩弓堡壘、聖殿騎士、死靈法師，還有地震機把敵人切開、燒焦并踩碎 - 嘿，這次真的很不一樣哦 
· 超過18種防禦塔技能！釋放死亡騎士、瘟疫雲或刺客，去竊取敵人寶藏，暗殺敵人！
· 超過40種具有特殊技能的敵人！隨時待命，對抗沙漠塵暴、部落薩滿、遊牧部落和地下恐怖生物 · 16位傳奇英雄。選擇你的戰士，訓練他們的技能！
· 每一關都有特別的部隊和特色！當心黑龍！
· 殘酷的頭目戰鬥！嘿！早就告訴你要升級啦…
· 超過70個成就，需要數小時去完成！
· 經典、鋼鐵和英雄模式挑戰你的戰術技能！
· 3種難度模式！準備好迎接真正的挑戰了嗎？開啟困難模式吧！悅耳的配樂、雄渾的配音，還有精緻美術，都能讓你沉浸！（还有卡通血液，效果逼真。）
· 遊戲内有百科全書！真正的勇士知己知彼…還對自己的防禦塔了如指掌。
學起來！

《王國保衛戰》廣受好評：IGN編輯推薦、Slide To Play必玩遊戲、148Apps編輯推薦、Jay is Games年度遊戲獎、Pocket Gamer金獎、Touch Arcade評分4.5/5、CNET最佳iPad遊戲"

tw.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series.
It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world.
You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless.


Story:

A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins...



Key Features:

- Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world.

- A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go?

- A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition.  And your life.

- Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed.  Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds.

- Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

us.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

us.description:

DOES NOT support: iPhone 5S, iPad Air, iPad Mini 2 & 3 and iPod Touch

Interpret the law as you see fit in This Is the Police 2, sequel to the acclaimed noir drama This Is the Police! Run the sheriff’s department, manage your cops, investigate, interrogate, and incarcerate. Make tough decisions – and try to keep out of prison yourself! – in this story-driven mixture of adventure, strategy, and turn-based tactical combat.

Is it a simulation? A management game? A tactical challenge? A visual novel? A puzzle? It’s all of these, and more!

Dive into one-of-a-kind -story-driven experience.
Welcome to Sharpwood, a cold and harsh border town riven with violence, where no one is completely innocent. Smugglers, gangs, and screaming populists call this town their home. To maintain peace and order, the young sheriff Lilly Reed (Sarah Hamilton) will have to team up with fugitive criminal Jack Boyd (Jon St. John), and pray that her dangerous plan doesn’t spiral out of control.

Take charge of the Sheriff’s department.
Your subordinates aren’t just some resource; they are living people with their own strengths, weaknesses, fears, and prejudices – and you'll have to reckon with all of them in order to survive. Is one of your guys drinking too much? Or always coming up with excuses for not coming to work? Or does he refuse to follow orders? You’ll have to show a steady hand if you want to impose discipline on this department.

Engage in tactical combat.
During your most dangerous operations, the game will switch to turn-based combat. Gather a team of your finest cops. Carefully study the terrain, adapt your plans, stealthily approach your suspects and use non-lethal weapons and equipment – if the situation allows. True, sometimes gunfights are almost impossible to avoid, but be careful: This Is the Police 2 doesn’t have hit points. A single bullet can cost a cop their life.

Become a true detective.
Collect evidence, study case materials, interrogate suspects and send the criminals to court. And if the suspect was innocent? Perhaps it's time to find out if any Sharpwood judges can be bought.

Thank you for playing ‘THIS IS THE POLICE 2’!

us.description:
MoneyTrack - Smart Personal Finance Tracker
Record every dollar, take control of your finances. A clutter-free budgeting app with zero ads, zero splash screens, and zero financial product promotions.

■ KEY FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Seamlessly integrates with Shortcuts for automatic expense capture triggered by your transactions
• Versatile Entries: Track income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Powerful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns through pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly spot financial issues
• Smart Budgeting: Create annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily allowance adjustments

■ COMPREHENSIVE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified dashboard for all account types (cash, checking accounts, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and net worth tracking for real-time financial status monitoring
• Credit card management system (payment alerts, limit tracking, grace period calculation)
• Multi-currency support with exchange rates for all major world currencies

■ SMART FEATURES
• Multiple Books: Easily separate personal, business, and project finances
• Collaborative Tracking: Invite family members to create transparent household finances
• Cloud Sync: Free data backup across devices with secure protection
• Easy Import/Export: Support for importing from banking apps and exporting to Excel
• Recurring Transactions: Set up automatic entries that generate on schedule
• Payment Plans: Track installment payments with due date reminders
• Custom Categories: Create unlimited category levels to match your financial organization

■ MULTI-DEVICE EXPERIENCE
Sync between iPhone, iPad and PC with instant updates, keeping your financial picture complete no matter where you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCIAL WELLNESS
We're dedicated to one mission — helping you achieve financial clarity. No investment pitches, no social distractions, just a clean and effective expense tracking experience.

us.releaseNotes: Luwian V4.0 is a platform equipped with cutting-edge computer vision and image processing features.
us.description:
Luwian is a sophisticated camera application designed to provide complete manual control over camera hardware, thus empowering the user to unleash their creativity using DSLR design. Additionally, the app comes with the Luwian Raw Magic Lite post-processing editor, which enhances the quality of images.

The manual controls offered by Luwian include exposure, focus, focus lock, zoom, and white balance, with both preset and custom adjustment options, ISO, and shutter speed. The app also provides access to 40 filters, 29 virtual FX, 17 analog films, and 36 classic movie tones, which are all readily available on the main camera panel.

Luwian is a powerful tool for both amateur and professional photographers, offering an array of features that allow them to capture stunning images with ease. Its intuitive interface ensures that users can easily navigate the app and access its features, while its manual controls enable them to exercise precise control over the camera hardware. With Luwian, photographers can capture their vision with precision and clarity, making it an ideal tool for those in the field of photography.

Main Panel Features :

Exposure control
Focus + focus lock control
Zoom
White balance 
ISO 
Shutter speed 
Target grid
Fullscreen
Orientation indicator
Current resolution indicator
Torch mode: auto / on / off
Flash mode: auto / on / off
Camera switch menu
Video recording switch button: Normal / Slow Motion / Time-lapse
Shutter button
Video recording button
Dual camera recording mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
True depth backdrop camera (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Shutter Timer
Manual mode
Auto mode
Portrait mode (only iPhone 11 and later models)
Analog film mode
Cinetone filter mode
Classic filters and VFX
Menu
Luwian Raw Magic Lite

us.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

us.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

us.description:
You are reading this text.
 But why?
 Are you looking for a game,
 or has the game found you?
 Religion Inc. is more than just a strategy game.
 It is a simulation of creating a new reality.
 Will you shape faith,
 or will faith shape you?
 Humanity has always sought light in the darkness.
 It has always longed to believe in something greater,
 something that gives meaning to existence.
 That’s how religions were born –
 as beacons in the storms of history,
 as compasses in the ocean of life.
 What if you become the creator of a religion?
 What if you could build your own faith, your own truth, your own reality?
You are the Creator.
 You are the source.
 You are the inspiration.
 And if you are reading this text – you’re already in the game!
 All that’s left is to install – and enjoy the process, the simulation of creating religions!

 Become the source of faith – in the strategy simulator Religion Inc.

 Humanity has always felt the need to believe in something greater than itself. Throughout history, people have searched for a light that could guide them through the darkness of the ages. For millions, that light became faith. Religion became a beacon, helping many find meaning in this world, weather the storms of change, and discover a path to happiness.

 There are many religions in the world, each shaped by its time and its challenges. But how else could this process have developed? What other fascinating and diverse forms could human beliefs have taken? The answers await you in our new game! Create your own unique religion, test its strength through the trials of time, and see if it can lead humanity to unity.

Game Features
*A variety of religious archetypes with unique cultural values and traditions!
*Unlock all archetypes through gameplay: monotheism, spiritualism, pantheon, shamanism, paganism, and many more!
*Will your followers become devoted fanatics or achieve higher enlightenment? The choice is yours!
*Hundreds of real-world religious aspects – and even more to come! Learn more about world religions!
*Unique active abilities for each archetype – perform miracles and change the world!
*Relaxing gameplay, perfect for an evening break: collect faith points with simple clicks and explore various religious aspects. Play at your own pace and enjoy!

Create your own unique religion by combining different religious aspects in the strategic simulator – Religion Inc.

Peace and love to all, brothers and sisters!

us.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.

us.description:
µBrowser is the micro browser for your Apple Watch.
µBrowser is the quick way to do some basic browsing on your Apple Watch when it is necessary. While it is limited it is good way to browse the web when you have no other device around.

Features:
- Open any URL (Entering a URL works especially good with the new Series 7 keyboard)
- Search the web with DuckDuckGo
- See your last visited pages
- Save pages from the history to your favorites
- iOS companion app to manage bookmarks
- Complications to quickly access the browser from the watch face

Please note:
µBrowser is a limited browsing experience. At first it is limited by the device size.
Then there are limitations regarding Javascript and large webpages. Login on pages will most likely not work. There is no back button (swiping still works) you need to start a new sessions.

tr.description:
--

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

--

tr.description:
SEIZE FORBIDDEN TREASURES. SUMMON ALIEN GODS. FEED ON YOUR DISCIPLES.

BE WARNED. This game has no tutorial - part of the challenge is figuring out how to play. It's hard, but keep trying, and you'll master it. Good luck!

In this infamous roguelike narrative card game, play as a seeker after unholy mysteries in a 1920s-themed setting of hidden gods and secret histories. Become a scholar of the unseen arts. Craft tools and summon spirits. Indoctrinate innocents. Seize your place as the herald of a new age.

Cultist Simulator was first released on PC and has more than 200,000 players all over the world. Now we’re bringing the cosmic mysteries of Cultist Simulator to mobile.

• Challenging roguelike gameplay - There is never only one history.
Cultist Simulator doesn’t hold your hand. Experiment, expire and transcend death with a story-driven legacy system. Over time you’ll learn enough to wrestle the game to its knees.

• Intense, immersive narrative – Combine cards to tell your own story.
A hefty novel’s worth of choice-based storytelling, from the creator of Fallen London and Sunless Sea. There are many paths through this game of ambition, appetite and abomination, and many ways your tale can end.

• A rich Lovecraftian world – Corrupt your friends and consume your enemies.
Search your dreams for sanity-twisting rituals. Translate grimoires and glean their lore. Penetrate the realm of the Hours and win a place in their service. Cultist Simulator brings the peripheral horror of Lovecraft’s tales to an entirely new setting.

Expand your knowledge with the DLCs: New Legacies, New Ascensions, New Mechanics...
• The Dancer - Join the Bacchanal
• The Priest - Knock, and Ye Shall Be Opened
• The Ghoul - Taste of the graveyard's fruit
• The Exile - Some there are who will not yield

If you encounter any issue with the game, please click on “Contact us” at the bottom of this page and give us as many details as possible regarding the issue and your device: https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/11-cultist-simulator/?p=ios

tr.description:
Step into the thrilling world of spies and secret agents! Codenames App brings the beloved word association game to your mobile device in a dynamic and engaging new way. Decipher your spymaster's one-word clues, connect the right words, and contact all your agents before the opposing team does to claim victory. This digital adaptation captures all the excitement of one of the most popular board games worldwide, now optimized for your pocket.


A Game of Clever Connections and Quick Thinking
---------------------------------------------------
Codenames App is an asynchronous multiplayer experience where two rival teams face off in a battle of wits and wordplay. Your objective? Find the best way to link as many words as possible with a single clue, outsmart the opposing team, and lead your side to victory. Whether you're teaming up with friends, playing against other secret agents, or going solo, the Codenames App offers endless strategic fun for everyone.


Inspired by the Iconic Board Game
----------------------------------
Join the millions of players worldwide who have fallen in love with Codenames. Designed by Vlaada Chvátil, the Codenames App is the latest addition to the renowned Codenames family. Experience the game that has captivated people of all ages and become a cultural phenomenon.


More Content, More Fun
-------------------------
While staying true to the original’s clever word-based puzzle mechanics, the Codenames App goes beyond the table, bringing you thousands of new thematic words and engaging twists on gameplay. Enjoy new modes, unlock exciting upgrades, and collect achievements as you explore deeper into the world of Codenames.


Play Anytime, Anywhere
------------------------
With our asynchronous multiplayer system, you can play at your own pace without the need to wait for others to be online at the same time. Each player has up to 24 hours to take their turn, so the game fits perfectly into your schedule. Start multiple matches, challenge new players, or enjoy special daily solo challenges.


Build Your Secret Agent Career
-------------------------------
Rise through the ranks of your spy agency, leveling up and earning rewards along the way. Prove your mastery in word association puzzles, unlock unique gadgets, new game modes, and expand your personal word collection. Showcase your skills and become the ultimate spymaster!


Connect and Compete with Friends
-----------------------------------
Challenge your friends or find new opponents from around the globe through our matchmaking system. Share your achievements, unlocked modes, and special word collections in friendly matches. Whether you're playing casually or climbing the competitive ranks, Codenames App is all about having fun with words.

Codenames App - The Board Game You Love, Reimagined for Your Mobile!

Ready to kickstart your journey to a healthier you on a budget? Look no further than the Roman app – your ultimate companion for achieving effective weight loss, shedding those extra pounds, and transforming your health without breaking the bank on expensive foods.

• Budget-Savvy Healthy Living: Embrace a healthier lifestyle with tips on nutrition, meal prep, and calorie-conscious choices that won't strain your wallet. Learn how to make every calorie count toward your health, budget weight loss goals, and fat burning efforts, all while enjoying affordable and nutritious food options.
• Progress Tracking: Monitor your budget weight loss journey with built-in tracking features. Keep an eye on your calorie-conscious meal plans, nutrition intake, and your progress towards achieving your ideal weight, all while maximizing fat burning, on a budget.
• Setting and Achieving Goals: Set realistic health and budget-friendly weight loss goals and use the app to track your progress. Stay motivated and accountable on your transformation journey, guided by expert nutritional advice and personalized tips for effective fat burning.
• Budget-Friendly Meal Plans: Optimize your meal plans for cost-effective weight loss, ensuring you're on the right path to achieving your goals without overspending on food. Receive nutritional guidance that makes it easier to maintain a balanced diet while staying within your budget and supporting fat burning.
• Calorie Tracking on a Budget: Keep a close eye on your daily calorie intake and expenditure while staying within your budgetary constraints. Achieve your weight loss and budget health goals without breaking the bank, thanks to our expert nutritional advice, progress monitoring tools, and fat burning insights.
• Wellness and Transformation: Prioritize your wellness journey with our affordable and personalized approach to nutrition and health. Experience a transformation in your overall well-being while staying on budget, supported by effective fat burning strategies.

The Roman app is your go-to solution for achieving a healthier, budget-conscious lifestyle. Say goodbye to costly diets and embrace a budget-friendly approach to weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning. Whether your goal is to lose weight, improve your health, or simply live more frugally while prioritizing your well-being, this app equips you with the tools, personalized guidance, and progress monitoring you need. Start your budget weight loss, nutritional wellness, and fat burning transformation today with the Roman app!

tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

tr.description:
MagicKit AI is a complete utility app designed to help you monitor your device, optimize performance, and access everyday tools from one convenient interface. Built specifically for iOS, MagicKit AI brings together essential features while maintaining your privacy and battery life.

Device and System Tools
• Battery Status: View current charge level and charging state
• Storage Usage: Analyze available and used storage
• Device Info: Check basic hardware and system details
• Uptime Tracker: Monitor how long your device has been running
• Battery Tips: Get practical advice to improve battery usage
• Photo Cleaner: Detect and remove duplicate or similar photos to free up space
• Contact Cleaner: Organize contacts by finding duplicates and incomplete entries
• RAM Manager: Monitor memory usage and optimize performance
• Device Benchmark: Test CPU, GPU, memory, and network performance

Network Tools
• Speed Test: Measure internet connection speed
• Wi-Fi Info: See network name, IP address, and connection status
• IP Lookup: Check geolocation of public IP addresses
• Location Info: Track GPS location, speed, direction, and altitude

Security & Privacy Tools
• Password Generator: Create strong, secure passwords with customizable options
• Passphrase Generator: Generate memorable and secure passphrases
• UUID Generator: Create unique identifiers in various formats
• Secure PIN Generator: Generate secure PIN codes with multiple options
• Temporary Email: Create disposable email addresses for privacy protection

Utility Tools
• Unit Converter: Convert between different measurements
• Currency & Crypto Converter: Get live exchange rates for fiat and cryptocurrencies
• Date Time Calculator: Calculate differences between dates with business days support
• Time Zone Converter: Convert time across various time zones with live updates and DST status
• Countdown & Reminders: Create beautiful countdowns with customizable reminders and recurring events
• Magic Counter: Track multiple counters with detailed statistics and streaks
• QR Scanner: Scan QR codes instantly
• Document & Card Scanner: Capture and save high-quality document scans with AI-powered text recognition
• Compass and Level: Measure direction and level using device sensors
• Orientation Lock: Lock screen orientation while using the app
• Audio Meter: Measure surrounding sound levels using the microphone
• Clipboard Manager: Access and manage copied text within the app session
• Flashlight & Brightness: Turn on the device flashlight and adjust screen brightness
• Note Taker: Create, organize, and manage notes with categories and iCloud backup
• Universal Generator: Generate random data including text, numbers, dates, and more
• Color Palettes Studio: Create, extract, and manage beautiful color palettes from images or manually using color pickers — perfect for designers and creatives

Highlights
• Clean and user-friendly interface with new wizard-based tools
• Featured Tools section showcasing the most popular utilities
• No ads or in-app purchases
• Lightweight and battery-efficient
• Compatible with all iOS devices
• Frequent updates with new tools
• Built with privacy and performance in mind
• Dark/Light theme support with smooth animations

Perfect for
• Device monitoring and optimization
• Everyday measurement and conversion tasks
• Scanning documents and QR codes
• Cleaning up photo storage and contacts
• Creating and managing countdowns with reminders
• Tracking habits and progress with multiple counters
• Accessing quick tools like flashlight and brightness control
• Performing simple network diagnostics
• Generating secure passwords and managing privacy
• Taking quick notes and organizing information
• Designing and managing color palettes for creative projects

Download MagicKit AI today and simplify your daily tasks with one smart, powerful toolkit.
